meanings.definition: A young male attendant or servant
meanings.sent1: The pageboy helped carry the bags for the guests at the party.
meanings.sent2: The pageboy stood by the door, ready to assist anyone who needed help.
meanings.sent3: The pageboy tried to juggle too many plates at once and ended up dropping them all!
meanings.sent4: In the busy hotel, the pageboy was like a helpful shadow, always nearby.
meanings.sent5: The pageboy's cheerful smile brightened up the room as he greeted everyone.

meanings.definition: A hairstyle in which the hair is cut to the same length all around the head, typically with bangs at the front
meanings.sent1: Her new pageboy haircut framed her face beautifully.
meanings.sent2: The actress sported a classic pageboy hairstyle at the movie premiere.
meanings.sent3: The pageboy hairstyle made her look like a vintage movie star.
meanings.sent4: With her pageboy haircut, she felt like a character from a 1960s film.
meanings.sent5: The pageboy hairstyle gave her a timeless and elegant look.
